mapper.select: --페이징 SELECT A.*,B.* FROM ( SELECT tt1.RNUM as num, tt1.cm_seq as cmSeq, tt1.contents, tt1.MEMBER_SEQ as memberSeq, tt1.nickname as "memberNickname", --당일이면 시:분 , 그렇지 않으면 년/월/일 DECODE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), TO_CHAR(TT1.reg_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD'),--DECODE TO_CHAR(TT1.reg_dt, 'HH24:MI'),--위가 같으면 이걸 TO_CHAR(TT1.reg_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) as regDt --다르면 이걸 FROM( SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, t1.* FROM (select cm_seq, bd.member_seq, bd_seq, Contents,REG_DT, bd.membernickname, m.nickname FROM BD_COMMENT bd, member m --WHERE 조건 있으면 추가 WHERE BD_SEQ = #{bdSeq} and bd.member_seq = m.member_seq ORDER BY bd.reg_dt DESC )T1 --종료 번호 WHERE ROWNUM <= #{pageSize} * #{pageNo} ) TT1 --시작 번호 WHERE RNUM >= #{pageSize} * (#{pageNo} - 1) +1 ) A CROSS JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(*) totalCnt FROM BD_COMMENT bd, member m WHERE bd_seq = #{bdSeq} and bd.member_seq = m.member_seq )B

SELECT A.*,B.* FROM ( ( SELECT CM_SEQ as CMSEQ, contents, TO_CHAR(reg_dt,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AS regDt, MEMBER_SEQ FROM BD_COMMENT WHERE cm_seq = #{cmSeq} ) TT1 )A CROSS JOIN ( SELECT M.NICKNAME memberNickname FROM MEMBER M WHERE TT1.MEMBER_SEQ = M.MEMBER_SEQ ) B
mapper.update: UPDATE BD_COMMENT SET contents = #{contents}, REG_DT = SYSDATE WHERE cm_seq = #{cmSeq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BD_COMMENT ( BD_SEQ, MEMBER_SEQ, CM_SEQ, CONTENTS, REG_DT )VALUES ( #{bdSeq}, #{memberSeq}, COMMENT_SEQ.nextval, #{contents}, SYSDATE )
